Module eu.lilithmonodia.winestock
Package eu.lilithmonodia.winestock.data

Class Assortment<W extends Wine>

java.lang.Object
eu.lilithmonodia.winestock.data.Assortment<W>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<W>, Collection<W>
public class Assortment<W extends Wine> extends Object implements Collection<W>
The Assortment class represents a collection of Wine objects.

It allows for various operations including addition, removal, and retrieval of wines. The class maintains the properties such as ID, total price, and wine names in the Assortment.

  • Constructor Details

    • Assortment

      public Assortment()
      Default constructor for the Assortment class.

      Initializes an Assortment with a default ID of -1, an empty Wine list, null year, zero total price, and an empty wine names string.

    • Assortment

      public Assortment(int id)
      Overloaded constructor for the Assortment class.

      Initializes an Assortment with the given ID, an empty Wine list, null year, zero total price, and an empty wine names string.

      Parameters:
      id - The ID for the Assortment
